title: Transformational Play-Based Video Game Design for Social Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Social domain job competency enhancement, cultivating real-world problem-solving skills through game-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement social problem-solving strategies in a video game simulation environment.
Learners can evaluate game-based learning scenarios and propose improvements by applying transformative play theory.
Learners can explain a systemic approach to inducing changes in a virtual society through collaborative problem-solving processes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
